resources.string: Need more info?See our mortgage guide and calculators>

These results are for repayment mortgage and are only intended as a guide.Make sure you obtain accurate figures from your lender before committing to any mortgage.Your home may be repossessed if you do not keep up repayments on the mortgage.\nPlanmove receives a fixed monthly fee from Nationwide for introductions made via the Planmove platforms.It\'s up to you if you choose Nationwide or a different lender to suit your mortgage needs and circumstances.
Most lenders would expect a minimum deposit of 10%
